Name: Home Deco Puzzles
About the game: MEMORIZE Try to memorize where each item has its position and its surroundings. UNPACK After a short amount of time all items are put into boxes and ready to be unboxed. DECORATE Now decorate the room wiht the items and put each item back to its originally position! Home Deco Puzzles brings you the joy of building miniature interiors mixed into a relaxing puzzle game. A room will be shown and after a short amount of time packed into boxes. Now you have to unpack the whole room and place each item back to his originally position. Unbox and decorate four different room types starting with small single rooms, double rooms, penthouse rooms and big Studio rooms. The peaceful soundtrack completes the game into a meditative puzzle experience. Can you unpack the room and place each item back to his originally position ? It is Simple, relaxing and fun for everyone! Features : Four different room sizes A variety of different rooms like small and big Living Rooms, Lofts and Coffee shops and more (currently 48 Rooms) Relaxing game experience Train your memory at the same time!
